projects.title: Iliana Hegewisch Landing Page
projects.body: I designed and built this landing page from scratch. I implemented modern and custom features that best fitted the customer's needs. I also used some of the latest web technologies to make the site responsive and fast.

projects.title: Sachin Global Traders Website
projects.body: This website showcased some of the products offered by an Indian Spice Trading Company. It was built to be highly customizable and scalable, just change the data and the webppage adapts to it. It was built using the same ReactJS, NextJS, and TailwindCSS stack

projects.title: NextGeek Technologies Website
projects.body: Built the website of an IT Company. I particularly enjoy the design of this website, which was built using ReactJS, NextJS, TailwindCSS and finally, Formspree.io, the backend service that managed contact form

projects.title: Vigiles Analytica Landing Page
projects.body: This website was made for a threat analysis security company based in Canada. It was built using the mostly the same technologies: ReactJS, NextJS, TailwindCSS. The deployment process was a bit different because it was done via FTP to a bluehost server

projects.title: Prettier Homework PWA
projects.body: Prettier Homework is a to-do list progresive web app that syncs your data in real time with your account thanks to Google Firebase's Firestore. Built with ReactJS and Material UI, it's a great looking, highly functional web application
